sentences.sentence: Business usually slackens off at this time of the year.
sentences.translation: 每年这个时候生意一般都很清淡。

sentences.sentence: If an artist slackens the pace, he will be beaten by his rivals.
sentences.translation: 假如一位艺术家放慢步伐，和他竞争的人就要把他打倒。

sentences.sentence: This is why fine lines occur, skin slackens , and even joint and muscle pain occur.
sentences.translation: 因此才会产生细纹及造成皮肤松弛，甚至产生关节、骨骼疼痛的现象。
